backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing chatrooms, messages, user profiles, reactions, access control, and storage using ordered maps and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing routing, components, hooks, and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, error pages, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog allowing users to set avatars via uploads or Giphy search with debounced queries and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat interface managing message list, auto-scroll, sending messages, replies, pinned video, and collapsible header.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with dynamic media previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter, including thumbnail fetching and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal for creating a chatroom with topic, description, category, and media input supporting uploads, YouTube/Twitch URLs, and Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with navigation, username editing, avatar selection, and chatroom back navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that intentionally renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, replies, timestamps, video embeds, and optional Twitter widgets.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides text input, media upload, video/Twitter link validation, and voice recording for sending new messages.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it from the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty or placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, timing, and synchronized playback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures chatroom list refetches once when the actor becomes ready, removing legacy cache keys and invalidating the main query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and persistence through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines chatroom, message, and profile queries and mutations using the backend actor with local user data helpers and cache logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling with theme variables, dark mode, mobile-friendly input rules, and custom voice message slider styles.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a compact number formatter for values in thousands, millions, or billions.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy, mapping API responses into a simplified GIF object format with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, progress tracking, and fallbacks when compression is unnecessary or fails.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and reconstructs safe Twitter oEmbed previews with caching, deduplication, and HTML parsing for text and images.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching of Twitter oEmbed previews with versioning, validation, expiration, and key generation based on tweet IDs.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts identifiers from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generates corresponding thumbnail or embed URLs with helper type checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by creating the root and wrapping it with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Implements an admin interface for authenticating via a hardcoded password and managing chatrooms, including fetching and deleting entries.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Fetches a chatroom by ID, increments its view count once loaded, handles loading/error states, and renders ChatArea.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays chatroom lists with search and category filters, manages initial fetch logic, and handles loading/error states with navigation to chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking known issues, feature requests, and architectural notes for fixing initial lobby chatroom loading behavior.
